channel.title: Industry ratings on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Industry ratings on FinanClub

item.title: NCLH
item.description: score:170 Chances: Norwegian Cruise Line is showing rising price performance and has recently received an upgrade to its IBD Relative Strength Rating. Oceania Cruises, a subsidiary of Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings, has announced the appointment of two Master Chefs of France as its executive culinary directors, indicating a focus on high-quality culinary experiences which could attract more customers.
